hero-text: I'm a web developer whose passion is the frontend with React,<br class='mobile'/> but I've also spent a lot of time in the backend with PHP.
frontend-skills-text: React in combination with TypeScript is a must nowadays, Tailwind complements this combination nicely. Next.js perfectly connects frontend with backend, GraphQL with Apollo client is suitable for larger headless projects, tRPC is enough for smaller ones.
backend-skills-text: PHP and MySQL are technologies that have been with me since the beginning. I have also spent a lot of time with Magento - e-commerce framework. I ran several custom Linux servers running several projects, from web hosting on Apache, to Node.js applications, to Minecraft servers in Java.
